sentences.sContent: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.sCn: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.sContent: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.sCn: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.sContent: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.sCn: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.sContent: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.sCn: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.sContent: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.sCn: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.sContent: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.sCn: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

synos.tran: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外

phrases.pCn: conj. 即使那样；即使在那时

trans.tranCn: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
trans.tranOther: at a particular time in the past or future
